EmailTemplate.name: List Import Agreement (Please Reply)
EmailTemplate.subject: List Import Agreement (Please Reply)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: By submitting this information, you represent and acknowledge to TORCHx that you have obtained the necessary, authorized consent from the individuals in the database provided to contact them via residential number, mobile number and/or text messaging (including use of automated dialing equipment and pre-recorded calls) and that you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of our Master Service Agreement . You represent and warrant that each person(s) you have provided as a lead has provided the necessary authorizations and consents to receive communications through the Services (for example, via SMS, emails, etc.) We make no representation and shall have no liability or obligation whatsoever in relation to such communications. If you agree to this statement, you must reply with the statement "I AGREE."
